概述  软件包   类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

org.cs2c.nginlib.config
接口 Block

所有超级接口：
java.lang.Cloneable, Element
public interface Block
extends Element

作者：
Mikes

Block represents a range of directive with "{}". Block can contain sub blocks and directives. The sequence of calling addBlock and addDirective is sensitive.

For instance, if you call addBlock and then call addDirective, Finally toString should return:
[block name] ... {
...
}
[directive name] ...;

But not return:
[directive name] ...;
[block name] ... {
...
}

另请参见：
Element

方法摘要
 void addBlock(Block block)
          Add a block in the block end.
 void addDirective(Directive directive)
          add a directive in the block end.
 java.util.List<Block> getBlocks()
          Get sub block list with in the instance.
 java.util.List<Directive> getDirectives()
          Get all directives directly in the block.
 
从接口 org.cs2c.nginlib.config.Element 继承的方法
clone, getName, setName, toString
 

方法详细信息

getBlocks

java.util.List<Block> getBlocks()
Get sub block list with in the instance.

返回：
sub blocks with list container. If the block have no sub block, an empty list should be returned.

getDirectives

java.util.List<Directive> getDirectives()
Get all directives directly in the block.

返回：
directives with list container. If the block have no directive, an empty list should be returned.

addBlock

void addBlock(Block block)
Add a block in the block end.

参数：
block - block to be added.

addDirective

void addDirective(Directive directive)
add a directive in the block end.

参数：
directive - directive to be added.

 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架
